title: Smart Data Models - WindGenType4IEC
description: Adapted from CIM data models. IEC Type 4 generator set model.  Reference: IEC Standard 61400-27-1 Section 6.6.3.4.

type.description: Property. NGSI type. It has to be WindGenType4IEC

dipmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum active current ramp rate (di). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

diqmax.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Maximum reactive current ramp rate (di). It is project dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

diqmin.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Minimum reactive current ramp rate (d). It is case dependent parameter. Default: 0.0

tg.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Time constant (T). It is type dependent parameter. Default: 0
